profile_summary: Detail-oriented and reliable Warehouse Assistant with over 3 years of experience in inventory management, order fulfillment, and record-keeping. Proven ability to work both independently and as part of a team, with a strong commitment to safety and efficiency. Familiar with the use of warehouse equipment and systems, and capable of lifting heavy objects. Recently worked as a Warehouse Assistant in Melbourne.

description: Managed inventory and maintained accurate records
Fulfilled orders in a timely and accurate manner
Adhered to all safety protocols and procedures
Operated warehouse equipment such as forklifts and pallet jacks
Lifted and moved heavy objects as required
Worked effectively as part of a team to meet deadlines
achievements: Reduced order fulfillment errors by 30% through implementation of a new inventory management system
